data.name: BLOCK HEIST: Robbery Simulator
data.detailed_description:
A game that won't let you get bored. Meet the unique action game Block Heist. Plan and commit the most daring robberies. While you are hacking the safe with a drill or waiting for a van to escape with the loot, you will have to fight off literally hordes of police and special forces who will do everything to eliminate you. The game will definitely appeal to fans of films about robberies and robbery.

  • Gameplay and replayability. Each passage is unique, choose the optimal strategy for yourself.
  • Individualize your character. The best skins, masks, body armor of your choice. Make your image awesome and original.
  • Music. Driving soundtracks will not leave you indifferent.
  • A huge selection of weapons. Pistols, submachine guns, rifles, as well as a wide variety of cold weapons. In addition to weapons, each team member can use certain equipment such as first aid kits, bags of ammunition and other necessary tools for robbers.
  • Unique game style - the confrontation between bandits and policemen has never looked so realistic. Go from an ordinary thief to a legendary robber.

data.short_description: A game that won't let you get bored. Meet the unique action game Block Heist. Plan and commit the most daring robberies.
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 500 Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz Quad-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600 Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
